description: This is a very unspecific relationship from one item of clinical information to another.  It does not judge about the role the pertinent information plays.
name: ActRelationshipPertains

text.div:
ActRelationshipPertains

This is a very unspecific relationship from one item of clinical information to another. It does not judge about the role the pertinent information plays.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActRelationshipType where concept is-a PERT
